mapper.insert: insert into jiajiao.orders (tea_name, tea_phone, stu_name, stu_phone, item, address, price, create_time,type) values (#{teaName}, #{teaPhone}, #{stuName}, #{stuPhone}, #{item}, #{address}, #{price}, #{createTime}, #{type})
mapper.select: select * from jiajiao.orders where tea_name= #{teaName} and type = 0
select * from jiajiao.orders where stu_name= #{stuName} and type = 0
select * from jiajiao.orders where stu_name= #{stuName} and tea_name= #{teaName}
mapper.update: update jiajiao.orders set tea_name=#{teaName}, tea_phone=#{teaPhone}, stu_name=#{stuName}, stu_phone=#{stuPhone}, item=#{item}, address=#{address}, price=#{price}, create_time=#{createTime}, type=#{type} where id = #{id}
